verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- how טּ֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov Behold how good וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- and how נָּעִ֑ים <S%H5273><s%> na-'Im; and how pleasant שֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> She-vet to dwell אַחִ֣ים <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chim [it is] for brethren גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- again יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad. together

כַּשֶּׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> kash-She-men ointment הַטּ֨וֹב׀ <S%H2896><s%> hat-Tov [It is] like the precious עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָרֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh, upon the head יֹרֵ֗ד <S%H3381><s%> yo-Red, that ran down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הַזָּקָ֥ן <S%H2206><s%> haz-za-Kan upon the beard זְקַֽן־ <S%H2206><s%> ze-kan- beard אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron; [even] Aaron's שֶׁ֝יֹּרֵ֗ד <S%H3381><s%> yo-Red, that went down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi to the skirts מִדּוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4060><s%> mid-do-Tav. of his garments

כְּטַל־ <S%H2919><s%> ke-tal- As the dew חֶרְמ֗וֹן <S%H2768><s%> cher-Mon, of Hermon שֶׁיֹּרֵד֮ <S%H3381><s%> shei-yo-Red [and as the dew] that descended עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הַרְרֵ֪י <S%H2042><s%> har-Rei upon the mountains צִ֫יּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon of Zion כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For שָׁ֨ם׀ <S%H8033><s%> sham there צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for there the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּרָכָ֑ה <S%H1293><s%> hab-be-ra-Chah; the blessing חַ֝יִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim, [even] life עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ha-'o-Lam. for evermore
